articles.title: Tata Tiago XT to get new features; Tiago NRG XT launch soon - Team-BHP
articles.description: Tata Motors is likely to introduce new features on the XT variant of the Tiago hatchback. The Tiago XT could soon get a height-adjustable driver seat and 14-inch hyper style wheels. It is also expected to get a rear parcel shelf, a vanity mirror and a blacked…
articles.content:

articles.title: Vodafone Idea to Get Good, Fresh Investment Believes Telecom Minister - TelecomTalk
articles.description: Ashwini Vaishnaw, the telecom minister of India, said during a telecom investors roundtable in Mumbai that Vodafone Idea Limited (VIL) will get good and fresh investment.
articles.content: The telecom sector has been helped by the Indian government a lot in the last year. It all started with the relief measures announced in September 2021. Vodafone Idea (Vi), the struggling Indian priv… [+1626 chars]
